title: Who Let the Dads Out?
deck: A monthly Saturday morning group for Dads and children
article:
Calling all Dads!

You are invited to a monthly Saturday morning group for Dads and primary male carers and their children aged 2-6 years (younger and older siblings welcome). 

Bacon and coffee 

Play and activities

Dad's challenge

10am-12pm at the Gateway Centre, Front Street, Acomb YO24 3BZ

A donation of Â£3 per family is requested
